title: Nanohanabatake de Tsukamaete
original_name: 菜の花畑でつかまえて
sinopse:
Miyu is a restaurant's daughter on an island, always helping out the family business. One day a couple of city boys visit and she meets a blondie named Keito for the first time?! Watch what unfolds in this sweet love story!

(Source: Ikemen Manga, edited)
